attributes.action: re-think the new deal 2week and 13 week courses...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment anyone who is placed on new deal is now subject to a 2 week course in which you spend 9am til 4pm "learning" how to write cv's, speculative letters and applying for upto 10 jobs, some you dont even want. Now for some people this may be ok but for those of us who know how to write a CV or just cant find the work we want because of the current state of affairs this is in no way useful therefor a waste of tax payers money.
